meanings.definition: The quality or state of being raunchy.
meanings.sent1: The raunchinesses of the movie made it unsuitable for children.
meanings.sent2: I could not handle the raunchinesses of the comedy show.
meanings.sent3: The raunchinesses of the party had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: Her sense of humor had a touch of raunchinesses that caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The raunchinesses of the joke lingered in the room long after it was told.

meanings.sent1: His raunchinesses at the party embarrassed his friends.
meanings.sent2: The raunchinesses of the performance shocked the audience.
meanings.sent3: The raunchinesses of his dance moves were hilarious.
meanings.sent4: She embraced the raunchinesses of her character on stage.
meanings.sent5: The raunchinesses of the situation made everyone uncomfortable.
